A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve never left a theater so sad in my life and I’ve never been so sad about a movie the day after I’ve seen it. I wanted it to get better but that feeling stopped once the credits began rolling. This movie has ruined the Star Wars legacy and I am no longer excited for upcoming Star Wars films. I thought it was really cheesy\, the script was terrible\, and the acting was bad. This movie was just made to sell merchandise and Disney had the balls to tarnish a legendary saga for $. So sad
